name: post_DQ_results_to_DZ
description: Post Glue DataQuality result to DataZone

parameters.name: roleToAssume
parameters.displayName: Role To Assume if Domain is remote
parameters.description: Role To Assume in case the Domain Account is different

parameters.name: dzDomain
parameters.description: The name to give to the first column after unpivot

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.displayName: Name of table assessed for Data Quality
parameters.description: The name Name of table assessed for Data Quality

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.displayName: Name of the schema of the table assessed for Data Quality
parameters.description: The name Name  schema of the table assessed for Data Quality

parameters.name: dqRuleSetName
parameters.displayName: Name of the Data Quality Result Set as it should appear in DataZone
parameters.description: The name of the Data Quality Result Set as it should appear in DataZone

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.displayName: Maximum number of DataZone asset to be return if matching table and schema are found
parameters.description: The Maximum number of DataZone asset to be return if matching table and schema are found default is 5
